collection_holder_name: Special Collections and Rare Books, University of Minnesota
pageContext.collection_description: Contains materials relating to all aspects of Sherlock Holmes in different media, including a log of Sherlock Holmes on radio, 316 Edith Meiser radio scripts, 154 sound recordings of the broadcasts on 33 1/3 rpm and 16" transcription discs and much more. A print guide to the collection, "Edith Meiser and Her Adventures with Sherlock Holmes: A Guide to the Edith Meiser Collection at the University of Minnesota," is available from the Department of Special Collections for $10.
